entry.title: Studnet Presentation@The 87th National Convention of IPSJ

link.title: Studnet Presentation@The 87th National Convention of IPSJ

entry.content:
Our lab students gave presentation at The 87th National Convention of IPSJ.

  1. Takuto ANDO, Yusuke INOUE, “Improvement of power efficiency for facial expressionrecognition system using DNN accelerator”, The 87th National Convention of IPSJ, 1J-04 Mar, 2025
  2. Jun SHONO, Yusuke INOUE, “Investigating Visual Characteristics during Gaze on Moving Objects in Foveated Rendering – Toward the Development of a Dynamic Resolution Adjustment System”, The 87th National Convention of IPSJ, 4S-05 Mar, 2025
entry.summary: Our lab students gave presentation at The 87th National Convention of IPSJ.

entry.title: Graduation Research Presentation (2024)
entry.content:
Inoue Lab. students present Graduation Research about each following theme.

Advanced Cource Students

  • ANDO Takuto
    • Multi-task DNN Facial Expression Recognition System using DPU on FPGA
  • MORISHITA Eishin
    • Perception of Weight through Moving Optical Illusions

5th Year Studens

  • KISHIDA Koga
    • Verification of Speaker Identification System Using DPU
  • SAKAMOTO Tokino
    • An MR User Interface for Agricultural Workers
  • TAGATA Rui
    • Segmentation of Chrysanthemum Lateral Buds using YOLO11
entry.summary: Inoue Lab. students present Graduation Research about each following theme.

entry.title: Research Presentation@CANDARW2024
entry.content:
A paper submitted by our lab student was accepted and presented at CANDARW2024 in Okinawa, Japan.

  1. Takuto ANDO, Yusuke INOUE, “Facial Expression Recognition System Using DNN Accelerator with Multi-threading on FPGA,” 2024 Twelfth International Symposium on Computing and Networking Workshops (CANDARW), Okinawa, Japan, Dec, 2024.
entry.summary: A paper submitted by our lab student was accepted and presented at CANDARW2024 in Okinawa, Japan.

entry.title: Studnet Presentation@Kyushu Section, IEICE
entry.content:
Our lab students gave presentation at Kyushu Section, IEICE.

  1. 岡直輝, 井上優良, “VRを活用した苦手な食品克服を目指すシステムの検討”, 2024年度（第32回）電子情報通信学会九州支部学生会講演会, A-09 Sep, 2024年
  2. 安藤拓翔, 井上優良, “小ねぎ調製位置検出のためのインスタンスセグメンテーション”, 2024年度（第32回）電子情報通信学会九州支部学生会講演会, D-27, Sep, 2024年
  3. 岸田航河, 井上優良, “話者識別のFPGA実装に向けた検討”, 2024年度（第32回）電子情報通信学会九州支部学生会講演会, D-32 Sep, 2024年
  4. 坂本勅乃, 井上優良, “MRデバイスを用いた農作業者向けインタフェースの開発”, 2024年度（第32回）電子情報通信学会九州支部学生会講演会, D-53 Sep, 2024年
  5. 森下 詠心, 井上優良, “動く錯視による重量感の提示”, 2024年度（第32回）電子情報通信学会九州支部学生会講演会, D-60 Sep, 2024年
entry.summary: Our lab students gave presentation at Kyushu Section, IEICE.

entry.title: Research Presentation@HotSPA2024
entry.content:
A peer-reviewed original paper co-authored with a student from our laboratory as the lead author has been published in the academic journal Agricultural Information Research.

  1. ANDO Takuto, INOUE Yusuke, “Real-time Detection of Green Onion Branch Position on Edge Devices,” Agricultural Information Research, Volume 33, Issue 2, Pages 73-80, Jul. 2024.

Agricultural Information Research - Real-time Detection of Green Onion Branch Position on Edge Devices
entry.summary: A peer-reviewed original paper co-authored with a student from our laboratory as the lead author has been published in the academic journal Agricultural Information Research.

entry.title: Research Presentation@HotSPA2024
entry.content:
Our Lab. Student presented at HotSPA2024 in Fuefuki, Yamanashi.

  1. ANDO Takuto, INOUE Yusuke, “Implementation of a Facial Expression Recognition System Using DPU on FPGA,” 2024-ARC-257(22), Jun., 2024.
entry.summary: Our Lab. Student presented at HotSPA2024 in Fuefuki, Yamanashi.

entry.title: Research Presentation@SASIMI2024
entry.content:
A paper submitted by our lab student was accepted and presented at SASIMI2024 in Taipei, Taiwan.

  1. Takuto ANDO, Yusuke INOUE, “FPGA Implementation of a DPU-Based Facial Expression Recognition System,” The 25th Workshop on Synthesis And System Integration of Mixed Information technologies, Taipei, Taiwan, Mar, 2024.
entry.summary: A paper submitted by our lab student was accepted and presented at SASIMI2024 in Taipei, Taiwan.
